Description: Hosted by the AACR-Associate Member Council (AMC), the Associate Member Meet and Greet is an exclusive opportunity for early-career researchers to obtain information about programs, events, and initiatives specifically for Associate members both at the conference and throughout the year; and meet with members of the AMC, who work with AACR leadership on behalf of the needs and concerns of graduate students, medical students and residents, and clinical and postdoctoral fellows.  Associate members can network, interact, and meet trainees like themselves. Attendees are also able to win raffle prizes! Refreshments will be provided.
Location: Salon A, Hilton New Orleans Riverside
